**CCDL 2019**

In this notebook, we'll perform quality control of scRNA-seq
count data. 

We'll use the csoneson/alevinQC package to analyze the quality of scRNA-seq alevin  [here](https://satijalab.org/seurat/pbmc3k_tutorial.html) 
```{r Install Packages}
# Attach library
BiocManager::install("csoneson/alevinQC")
```

#### Import gene expression matrix data
```{r Import Data}
alevinQCReport(baseDir = system.file("extdata/alevin_example", package = "alevinQC"),
               sampleId = "testSample", 
               outputFile = "alevinReport.html", 
               outputFormat = "html_document",
               outputDir = tempdir(), forceOverwrite = TRUE)
```
